element.name: TbbOneInst.Enabled
element.short: Determines whether the componet is active or not
element.descr: Default False. When enabled, prevents a second instance to be executed.

element.name: TbbOneInst.Identifier
element.short: A unique string defining the application.
element.descr: A unique string defining the application. Use a GUID to be sure no other application can have the same identifier. If no identifier is provided, the executable name is used.

element.name: TbbOneInst.UseParameter
element.short: Enable to distinguish between several instances launched with different parameters
element.descr: Default False. Allow simultaneous execution of the same application wwhith differeent command line parameters.

element.name: TbbOneInst.UpdateInterval
element.descr: With non-windows OS, polling interval to retreive message from second instance

element.name: TbbOneInst.OnOtherInstance
element.short: Event fired by the component when a second instance is launched
